title: Mantika Informal released
content:
I am pleased to announce that my latest typeface ‹Mantika Informal› is released at Linotype. Read [Linotype’s press release](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414125107/http:/www.linotype.com/6258/mantikainformal.html?PHPSESSID=6374ef1f344de88bb3c79717e8918b7c) here.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414125107im_/http:/typophile.com/files/tmt_MaI_bdg_4096.png)
author: J Weltin

comments.content:
I'm happy for the Greeks. but Linotype is scraping the barrel for unique fonts. I guess it's better than the regurgitating the old font and putting them into a package.  
Dr. Type
